solution_line_template: The cost of the bulb is ${lamp_cost} - ${bulb_less_than_lamp} = $<<{lamp_cost}-{bulb_less_than_lamp}={bulb_cost}>>{bulb_cost}.
The cost of {num_lamps} lamps is ${lamp_cost} x {num_lamps} = $<<{lamp_cost}*{num_lamps}={total_lamp_cost}>>{total_lamp_cost}.
The cost of {num_bulbs} bulbs is ${bulb_cost} x {num_bulbs} = $<<{bulb_cost}*{num_bulbs}={total_bulb_cost}>>{total_bulb_cost}.
